messages.content: hello how i can go to the Tehran

The intercity bus terminal is located in the northern part of the city, next to the Imam Khomeini International Airport. Buses run regularly to destinations throughout Iran, including Tehran, Damavand, and Mashhad. The terminal is well-organized and staffed with information kiosks, ticket offices, and car rentals. If you plan to travel by bus, it's a good idea to buy tickets in advance, as schedules can be subject to change.
